value:
You believe ME mad? It is HUMANITY
that has lost its way! You forget your
debt—my blood does not come free!

Valla was paradise... Those days...
Their melodies are lost. Smiles on
faces I no longer remember...

Why do you hinder me, deny me?!
Is it so wrong to crush that which
is beneath me?$k$pIs it so wrong to...wish for that which
I have lost?!

Are you able to call to your side...
any being you wish? Bring me...the
king of Valla from days past.

I will search as long as it takes...
The Valla I dream of must exist!
Where our kinds are not at odds...

This is not the land I seek... This is
not my Valla... I have come here at
$Nf's request...
What becomes of me matters not.
Quickly, on to the next world...

The turnings of this world are
of no interest to me.

Even this gesture is empty of real
meaning... Nevertheless, I will
remember this.

I am Anankos, of the First Dragons...
Why have you called me here?
Simply to kill? ...Or is there more?

You come to gawk? To take pleasure
in my suffering?$k$pOutside of Valla, I am but a shadow
of my true self. That much I know
now...painfully well...$k$pI am bound here, unable to act as
I choose...unable even to succumb
to madness.$k$pCadros is gone... I know this. So then
why can I think of nothing and no
one else?!$k$pI loathe you, Summoner, for forcing
me to live knowing this truth.$k$pThere will come a day when you will
learn what it means to suffer! I will
see to that! That is...unless...$k$pUnless, perhaps, we find you can
make a suitable substitute...
I will have my blood!
Contemptible vermin!
Fall beneath my feet!
I will not suffer alone!
Remember me...
Away, insect, unless you wish to vanish from this world.
You claim sanity, yet engage in such frivolous banter! Have you passed beyond reason?
Humans are chattel who forget what they owe when it suits them.
You stand no chance against one such as me! I will crush your bones beneath my feet—and even that fate is more than you deserve!
This world is wrong, wrong, wrong! This is not the path I am meant to tread!
Cadros... Hm. Even now, I think of you and remember those days with fondness...
You cannot know the pain of being forgotten—of what you are, what you are owed, falling from memory...
Hmph.
Where now?
Clear the way.
